2024/12/10
HSS I, Room D115 (人社院一館，D115室)
10:00-12:00 Trans-speakerism: Voices of Japanese University Professors

Explore a transformative perspective on language teaching in “Trans-speakerism: Voices of Japanese University Professors.” This talk, inspired by Hiratsuka (2024) and colleagues, redefines language identities with inclusive terms like Global Speaker and Global Teacher of English, challenging traditional labels and promoting diversity in education. Through the personal stories of Japanese university professors, discover the impact of Global Englishes, intercultural awareness, and professionalism on modern language and bilingual education. This session also offers practical insights and recommendations for future language teacher training. Don’t miss this engaging discussion on the evolving landscape of trans-speakerism in education!

Sign up here: https://forms.gle/iGWwrsoLRjMeyoZq9

 

2024年12月10日
地點: 人社院一館，D115室
10:00-12:00 跨語者主義：日本大學教授的聲音

本次講座將邀請大家一起與平塚教授探索語言教學新視角，以全球英語使用者和全球英語教師等包容性術語重新定義語言身份，挑戰傳統標籤並推動教育多樣性。透過日本大學教授的個人故事，了解全球英語、跨文化意識及專業素養對現代語言教育的影響。此次講座還將提供未來語言教師培訓的實用見解與建議，同時亦可運用於雙語教學之上，千萬別錯過這場引人入勝的跨言使用的前景討論！

報名連結: https://forms.gle/iGWwrsoLRjMeyoZq9
